# modifiedTask

**Instance Property**

The modified task.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var modifiedTask: INTask? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this property to specify the details of the task. Start with the original task details and apply any attribute changes made at the request of the user.
title: modifiedTask
